Title.Language: The Hymn of the Holy Spirit

Text.Language: Pip~neuma m~parakl/ton: v/e~tafi~ e~jen nia~poctoloc: qen p~sai n~]pent/koct/: aucaji qen hanm/s n~lac.
The Spirit of comfort: came down upon the apostles: on the feast of Pentecost: and they spoke in many tongues.

It came to pass: when the days of Pentecost were completed: that all twelve apostles: were gathered together.

Comment.Language: In the presence of the Pope, the following verse is added:
